archimate:Assessment.name: Tietoevry Connect Risk Management process is not working properly
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Even though, there is proper risk management process defined in Tietoevry Connect, it seems that it is not working.
This problem has been tried to mitigate through the standard risk management but risks has been thrown from one stakeholder to another. Due to this, time is lost which could be used to solve the issues.
